- June 18 - loss (37 - 33) - This is the fourth consecutive loss for the Blue Jays.
- June 20 - win (37 - 34)
- ... (There are no more losses until the end of the table.)

So, there was a sequence of four consecutive losses by the Blue Jays from June 4 to June 18.
